synthesis_conditions.washing_method: exchanged with acetone 10 times (each of 20 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated at 120 °C for 24 h under high vacuum up to 4 μmHg

synthesis_conditions.notes: MOF-505, MOF-508, and MOF-5 were synthesized and activated according to references. MIL-53 and ZIF-8 were purchased from Aldrich and activated at 150 °C and 100 °C for 24 h under high vacuum up to 4 μmHg, respectively.
